1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Singapore is renowned for its ability to transform, adapt and keep up with changing times. As it forges its path as a 21st century 'livable city', how will it prepare to meet the challenges of an ever changing, globalized world?

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Throughout its history, Singapore has managed to constantly reinvent its skyline. But how does a forward thinking city preserve its identity and heritage in the face of such dramatic change?

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Today's global cities have no choice but to start planning for a sustainable future, including green housing, domestic drinking water and food production. Find out how Singapore is getting ready for tomorrow.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: What makes life meaningful - and how can the cities we inhabit help us find the answer? This episode explores the ways in which a city can inspire us to live better, serve others, and devote our efforts to a greater good.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: The livability of a city is closely aligned with the way it produces new ideas and solves problems. Meet Singapore's designers, architects and artists while we explore the many facets that make up a creative environment and a living city.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: The world's most exciting, livable cities have a visible pulse - you can see it as well as feel it. Find out how Singapore is stepping up its game and finding its soul.
